title: Ticket #7809: Modernize condor_dagman codebase with C++ std libraries
description:
We should modernize the condor_dagman codebase with c++ standard libraries, instead of our undocumented and poorly-understood condor libraries. Some of this modernization includes:

  • MyString objects: replace with std::string
  • StringList objects: replace with std::list<string> or std::vector<string>
  • List<T> objects: replace with std::list<T> or std::vector<T>
  • PrioritySimpleList<T> objects: replace with std::priority_queue<T> objects

There are probably some others, I'll update this list in due course.
